title: Why are dogs so cute?
description:
People love dogs! And what's not to love? Dogs are loyal, helpful, kind, & fill our hearts with joy (and our brains with oxytocin!) They make wonderful companions which is why, during the pandemic, dog adoption rates have doubled, and in some places there are now waiting lists for furry friends that stretch into 2021.
Today's episode, DOGS, is for every human who loves dogs - and every dog who loves their human. In other words - it's for everyone! Enjoy!
And for some of the LATEST information about our bond with dogs, check out Smithsonian Magazine's excellent article this month The New Science of Our Ancient Bond with Dogs.
And to keep the learning going, sign up now for the free episode guide at www.WhoSmarted.com
 
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
